original_text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened, and have tasted of the heavenly gift, and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost,
korean_text: 한 번 빛을 받고 하늘의 은사를 맛보고 성령에 참여한 바 되고

sentences.original_text: for those who were once enlightened
and have tasted of the heavenly gift
and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost
